recipe.title: Pork Loin Sandwiches
ingredients: four 1-inch-thick slices from a boneless center-cut pork loin
Accompaniments: lettuce, tomato, mustard, and pickles
instructions: Trim fat from pork loins. Arrange each pork loin between 2 sheets or lightly oiled parchment or wax paper and with a mallet pound until 6 to 8 inches across, about 1/4 inch thick. In a bowl whisk together lour, cornmeal, salt, and pepper. In a heavy skillet heat 1/2 inch oil to 365°F. in a deep-fat thermometer. Dredge pork in flour mixture, shaking off excess. Fry pork loins in oil, 1 at a time, turning, until golden brown, about 3 minutes, and transfer to a plate lined with paper towels to drain.
